article.title: L-3 Receives Research and Development Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Services Incorporated, Mt. Laurel, New Jersey, was recently awarded a contract modification valued at more than $8 million to exercise an option for research and development of electronics and communications equipment/operational systems in support of the Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division's Air Traffic Control and Landing Systems.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
